resources.string: Perform arbitrary actions on screen text.

The Textbender accessibility service is required by both the text button overlay and Kiwi Browser Yomichan support. To use either of these features, please enable this service.

The text button overlay may be activated by either the accessibility shortcut or the floating button, after which all visible text on the screen will be turned into clickable buttons with configurable actions.

In addition to the above, enabling this feature also allows Textbender to open text directly in the Yomichan addon in Kiwi Browser if both are installed. Support for this is experimental. Please view Textbender’s README for more information.
